name: Regius - Black Label - Lord Madsen
additionalNotes: Regius Cigars are produced in Nestor Placensia’s famous factory in Nicaragua, designed for the luxury lifestyle. Regius crafts their blends using only the finest aged Nicaraguan tobaccos all grown on the prestigious Plasencia family farms, covered by an assortment of grade “A” wrappers in various shades. Whether you’re lighting up a bold medium to full bodied Black Label cigar or one of the medium-bodied USA Regius offerings that include Red, Blue, and White— you can count on a host of complex flavors befitting such a high-end brand. Handmade premium Regius cigars come in a variety of sizes that include classic vitolas and old word style figurados to accommodate just about every style of smoker.
